channel.title: Check out my flash game!
channel.description:
[b]Note: This game is still in [u]beta[/u]. I expect bugs, and such. I just want you guys to give some feedback.[/b]
Now I realize this game won't be for everyone. I know that for a fact. It's just something I started working on, and well it's getting pretty far into the coding process and I want to see if there are any bugs I missed and such (I'm sure there is, I just don't see em).
Here is the [u]First Beta[/u] of the game: [url=http://nyx-online.info/files/heartGame/heartGame.html]Beta v1 Link[/url]
This is the most current version, the [u]Second Beta[/u]: [url=http://nyx-online.info/files/heartGame/heartGameR2.html]Beta v2 Link[/url]
The second level is NOT finished. I've only added the first 5, of 20, objects. So once all 5 are done, you're "done" with the game.

item.title: Check out my flash game!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:8, topic:521525”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=640034.msg4313376#msg4313376 date=1371079260]

you know how you can move the sticks or whatever they are after you get the first stitch done? I can’t get the middle stick out of that area to move to the next stitching area.

You can’t get the third stitch to move?
[/quote]no sir not after you finish the first stitching[/quote]
You’re confusing the tits out of me man.
pics or something please?

Read full topic

item.title: Check out my flash game!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:7, topic:521525”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=640034.msg4313313#msg4313313 date=1371074551]
you know how you can move the sticks or whatever they are after you get the first stitch done? I can’t get the middle stick out of that area to move to the next stitching area.
[/quote]
You can’t get the third stitch to move?[/quote]no sir not after you finish the first stitching

item.title: Check out my flash game!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Loveandpower:

got to level two, after the first stitch i can’t get the stitch thingys to go to the next one ( the last one I mean )

There’s nothing after the first 5 stitches are added in

item.title: Check out my flash game!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

xxx123xxx:

Played it, I was strangely very into it. Tho, it’d be nice if on the first level the pieces turned red when you have them in the right spot, it was kind of annoying having to check every position and recheck. Also the mouse sensitivity required to fit the pieces perfectly is a tad too high

I didn’t set up a good loop system for the pieces, sorry.
I’ll also change the sensitivity though ^.^
Thanks for the feedback

Read full topic

Note: This game is still in beta. I expect bugs, and such. I just want you guys to give some feedback.

Now I realize this game won’t be for everyone. I know that for a fact. It’s just something I started working on, and well it’s getting pretty far into the coding process and I want to see if there are any bugs I missed and such (I’m sure there is, I just don’t see em).
